DOC.brief_summary: Celiac disease patients with HLA-DR7-DQ2 haplotype have the same histological, analytical and clinical behaviour as patients with HLA-DR3-DQ2 haplotype.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of celiac disease following ESPGHAN recommendations HLADQ2 typing including HLADR3DQ2 and HLADR7DQ2 haplotypes Patients who have not been diagnosed for celiac disease HLADQ2 typing that not include HLADR7DQ2 haplotype
